caption.p: Reported human H5N1 infections in Indonesia, 2005â€“2015. A, Number of human H5N1 infections in Indonesia reported to the World Health Organization (white bars) and cases included in this study (black bars). Lines depict case fatality proportions of reported infections (circles) and cases included in this study (squares). B, Geographical origin of cases. Size of pie diagrams reflect number of cases, with the dark fraction representing fatalities. Abbreviation: CFR, case fatality rate.
